label_ip_host: IP-Address (If you use Cloud leave blank)
label_use_bcrypt: Use bcrypt for authentication (instead of PBKDF2)
help_use_bcrypt: Enable only if your device/firmware requires bcrypt
help_parser: Uncheck to get any data available from API
label_cloud: Use cloud to get data from the Pilot
help_cloud: Not recommended in a local environment
label_add_param: Give additional Parameters as semicolon (;) seperated list
help_add_param: only needed if "Only read most..." is checked
